Amrita School of Engneering, Bangalore

{% load static %}

Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham (Amrita University) is a private university in India with seven campuses across four states. The Bengaluru campus is the youngest university to receive the highest grade, A, from the NAAC. It's also recognized by the NBA and is internationally recognized for its MBA and PhD programs.

BMS College of Engineering

{% load static %}

Founded in 1946, BMS College of Engineering (popularly known as BMSCE) is located in Bengaluru, Karnataka. It is accredited by the NAAC with 'A++' Grade and a CGPA of 3.83 on a scale of four. It is the first college of Karnataka to be accredited by the National Board of Accreditation (NBA).

Program Level:

  • BTech

    • Location: Bangalore
